description: cmd/go: better error for shadowed directories in GOPATH

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go/

https://codereview.appspot.com/9164043/diff/2001/src/cmd/go/build.go
File src/cmd/go/build.go (right):

https://codereview.appspot.com/9164043/diff/2001/src/cmd/go/build.go#newcode303
src/cmd/go/build.go:303: errorf("go install: no install location for directory %s hidden by %s", p.Dir, p.ConflictDir)
should this be "%s: hidden by %s" (with the colon) ? same for the next message

https://codereview.appspot.com/9164043/diff/2001/src/cmd/go/test.bash
File src/cmd/go/test.bash (right):

https://codereview.appspot.com/9164043/diff/2001/src/cmd/go/test.bash#newcode331
src/cmd/go/test.bash:331: export GOPATH=$(pwd)/testdata/shadow/root1:$(pwd)/testdata/shadow/root2
did you forget to add testdata/shadow? i don't see it in my tree
I'll get to this at some point. It's fairly low on my list.

subject: code review 9164043: cmd/go: better error for shadowed directories in GOPATH
